title: Remains of actor Julian Sands found after he disappeared while hiking in January
description: British actor Julian Sands, 65, was reported missing while hiking Mount Baldy in the Los Angeles area on Jan. 13, authorities said.

title: Maine Senate joins House in supporting greater access to abortions
description: The Maine Senate has joined the House in voting to expand abortion access.

title: NASA says system can recycle 98% of astronauts' urine, sweat into drinking water
description: NASA announced it can recycle 98% of the water astronauts have onboard the International Space Station, including sweat and urine, and turn it into drinking water.

title: Thousands of flights canceled, United CEO partially blames FAA again
description: Airlines have canceled more than 5,200 flights since Saturday in the U.S.

title: Haley says Trump did 'too little' about China threats, warns of global conflict if Ukraine falls
description: Haley warns weak support for Ukraine could encourage China to invade Taiwan.

title: Ryan Seacrest to replace Pat Sajak as 'Wheel of Fortune' host
description: Ryan Seacrest is replacing Pat Sajak as host of "Wheel of Fortune."

title: Failed Wagner rebellion a battle between ‘two thugs’: Former US ambassador
description: Bill Taylor, the former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine, spoke with ABC News Live Monday about the weekend's activity in Russia and its effects on the ongoing conflict.

title: More than $200 billion in pandemic relief squandered, says government watchdog report
description: The federal government squandered more than $200 billion in its rush to prop up small businesses during the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a government watchdog report.

title: Regime change 'far closer' after Wagner Group rebellion: Putin critic
description: Former oligarch Mikhail Khodorkovsky told ABC News the opposition must prepare to exploit future uprisings.

title: Family of Ajike Owens calls for murder charges in shooting that killed mother of 4
description: The family of Ajike Owens called on prosecutors to upgrade the charges against suspect Susan Lorincz from first-degree felony manslaughter to second-degree murder,

title: Supreme Court rejects unchecked state legislature power over federal election rules
description: The 6-3 opinion repudiated much of the "independent state legislature" theory.

title: Still hiring: Big Tech layoffs give other sectors an opening
description: The recent mass layoffs at companies like Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Meta came as a shock the thousands of workers who’d never experienced upheaval in the tech sector

title: US push to lower wildfire risk across the West stumbles in places
description: Using chainsaws, heavy machinery and controlled burns, the Biden administration is trying to turn the tide on worsening wildfires in the U.S. West through a multi-billion dollar cleanup of forests choked with dead trees and undergrowth

title: New details revealed in circumstances leading up to Jeffrey Epstein's suicide
description: Jeffrey Epstein hanged himself in his jail cell with an orange noose he fashioned from "a sheet or a shirt," according to a new report issued Tuesday.

title: WATCH:  Smart goat finds a way to get its own treats out of dispenser
description: This bright billy goat has learned how to use the food dispenser at Yellowstone Bear World in Idaho.

title: Train cars containing asphalt, sulfur still in Yellowstone River after derailment
description: Nine mangled cars -- six that contained hot asphalt, three holding molten sulfur and one with scrap metal -- were still in the rushing water on Monday evening.

title: Pope's peace envoy is heading to Moscow after the short-lived Wagner rebellion
description: Pope Francis’ peace envoy is heading to Moscow

title: Idaho college killings suspect was first arrested in 2014, records show
description: Idaho college killings suspect Bryan Kohberger was first arrested in 2014, records show.

title: Ralph Yarl, teen shot after going to the wrong house, speaks out in 'GMA' exclusive
description: Ralph Yarl, who was shot after mistakenly going to the wrong house, shared his story for the first time in an exclusive interview with GMA co-anchor Robin Roberts.

title: FBI and DHS 'failed' at 'fundamental level' in warning of Jan. 6: Senate report
description: The FBI and the Department of Homeland Security failed to adequately assess threats leading up to Jan. 6, according to a report by the Senate Homeland Security Committee.

title: Ex-Audi boss convicted of fraud after pleading guilty in diesel emissions scandal
description: Ex-Audi boss convicted of fraud after pleading guilty in German automaker's diesel emissions scandal

title: DeSantis asks judge to dismiss Disney lawsuit, claims immunity
description: Ron DeSantis asked a federal court to dismiss Disney's lawsuit against him, which claims illegal retaliation over a dispute over the so-called "Don't Say Gay" law

title: In audio recording, Trump discusses classified document he says he held onto
description: ABC News has obtained an audio recording of former President Trump appearing to acknowledge he held onto a sensitive military document after leaving office.
